00017 import javax.microedition.location.Criteria;
00018 import javax.microedition.location.Location;
00019 import javax.microedition.location.LocationException;
00020 import javax.microedition.location.LocationListener;
00021 import javax.microedition.location.LocationProvider;
00022 import javax.microedition.location.QualifiedCoordinates;
00023 
00024 
00034 public class GPSLocation {
00035 
00036         private Location currentLocation;
00037         private static int UPDATE_INTERVAL = 5;
00038         private static int LOCATION_TIMEOUT = 1;
00039         private static int MAX_AGE = 3;
00040         
00041         
00042         public GPSLocation(){
00043                 
00044         }
00045         
00051         public void startGPSListener()
00052         {
00053                 Criteria cr = new Criteria();
00054                 cr.setAddressInfoRequired(false);
00055                 cr.setAltitudeRequired(false);
00056                 cr.setPreferredResponseTime(Criteria.NO_REQUIREMENT);
00057                 cr.setSpeedAndCourseRequired(false);
00058                 cr.setCostAllowed(false);
00059                 cr.setHorizontalAccuracy(Criteria.NO_REQUIREMENT);
00060                 cr.setPreferredPowerConsumption(Criteria.NO_REQUIREMENT);
00061                 cr.setVerticalAccuracy(Criteria.NO_REQUIREMENT);
00062                 
00063                 // get provider
00064                 LocationProvider provider = null;
00065                 try {
00066                         provider = LocationProvider.getInstance(cr);
00067                 } catch (LocationException e) {
00068                         System.out.println("GPSLocation.getLocation Exception: " + e.toString());                               
00069                         return;
00070                 }               
00071                 
00072                 if (provider != null)
00073                 {
00074                         provider.setLocationListener(new LocationListenerImpl(), UPDATE_INTERVAL, LOCATION_TIMEOUT, MAX_AGE);
00075                 }
00076         }
00077 
00078         
00083         public boolean isValid()
00084         {
00085                 return (currentLocation != null && currentLocation.isValid());
00086         }
00087         
00088         
00094         public QualifiedCoordinates getCoordinates() {
00095                 if (isValid()) {
00096                         return currentLocation.getQualifiedCoordinates();
00097                 }
00098                 return null;
00099         }
00100 
00101         
00105     private class LocationListenerImpl implements LocationListener
00106     {
00107         
00108         public void locationUpdated(LocationProvider _provider, Location _location)
00109         {
00110             if( _location.isValid() )
00111             {
00112                 // update our location position
00113                 currentLocation = _location;
00114             }
00115 
00116         }
00117

00119                         // TODO Auto-generated method stub              
00120                 }  
00121     }
